general: m_c has reached the age of six moons and has been made an apprentice, with (mentor) as their mentor.
Newly-made apprentice, m_c, touches noses with their new mentor, (mentor).
m_c carefully touches noses with their new mentor, (mentor), looking quite intimidated and nervous.
m_c excitedly touches noses with their new mentor, (mentor), looking quite eager to start training.
m_c strides up to their new mentor, looking very proud and excited that they were apprenticed to (mentor).
In their eagerness, m_c accidentally shoves their nose into (mentor)'s so hard that (mentor) flinches back in surprise. m_c sheepishly apologizes, and the two have a good laugh about it.
(mentor) sees how nervous m_c is and whispers a quiet encouragement to them as they touch noses, promising to be a good mentor to them.
m_c touches noses with (mentor), wondering if this is truly the right path for them or not.
m_c remains calm as they touch noses with (mentor), but their twitching tail gives away how excited they truly are.
m_c can't seem to sit still as they bounce up to touch noses with (mentor), swearing they'll be the best warrior the Clan has ever seen.
m_c sits up straighter as they're called forward to be made an apprentice. While they try to look calm and collected, they still tremble a bit as they touch noses with (mentor).
Almost immediately after m_c touches noses with (mentor), they start asking about when they're going to go out and explore the territory.
m_c fidgets impatiently beside (mentor) as they wait for the meeting to end. They're finally an apprentice! They want to hurry up, get out there, and go, go, go!
Surprising (mentor), the first thing that m_c asks to do once the meeting ends is gather moss so everyone has fresh bedding.
m_c touches noses with (mentor) and hopes that they'll get to hunt first, so they can make sure the Clan is fed.
Eager to learn the best ways to help their Clan thrive, m_c excitedly touches noses with (mentor).

As m_c touches noses with (mentor), they hope they'll get to do something that will really impress the Clan on their first day. Maybe they could catch a big, fat, rabbit? Or chase off a fox! That'll show the Clan they're the best apprentice anyone's ever seen!
m_c sits excitedly beside (mentor) as the meeting ends, and hopes they'll be doing something exciting like battle training first. Their claws are itching to tear at something.
As m_c touches noses with (mentor), they hope that they won't be boring and let them do something cool. Anything but gathering moss or tick duty!
m_c purrs so hard that they're shaking as they touch noses with (mentor).
m_c silently swears to StarClan to do their best for the Clan as they touch noses with (mentor).
m_c touches noses with their mentor, (mentor), looking bored and unimpressed. But on the inside, they're bouncing with euphoria around as if they were still a kit!
As their mentor is about to be chosen, m_c interrupts and announces they want their mentor to be (mentor). They stride forward with confidence to touch noses with (mentor) when it's allowed.
Newly apprenticed m_c can't help but squeak when their mentor's name is announced, and they run with their tail tucked between their legs in embarrassment to touch noses with (mentor).

Messy as always, m_c bounds across camp to touch noses with their new mentor. (mentor) grimaces at the cold feeling of grime against their nose, but they purr anyway, not wanting to spoil m_c's excitement.

m_c has been pestering everyone for moons on when they finally get to be an apprentice, and everyone is relieved that they're finally free of the young cat's nagging... Until they start asking about when they're going to be a warrior as soon as the meeting ends.
(prefix)kit sits in front of the Clan with pride, their tiny heart beating so fast they think it might explode! They very excitedly touch noses with (mentor), happy to start their apprenticeship!
no_mentor: Newly-made apprentice, m_c wished they had someone to mentor them.
m_c isn't confident in their ability to train themself, but will try anyway.
m_c is frustrated that they don't have a mentor.
m_c isn't sure what to do without the guidance of a mentor.
abandoned: m_c is so, so very excited to finally have a mentor, solidifying them as part of the Clan. They're grateful to be here, really... but (mentor) can't replace the parent who gave them to this Clan, the parent who should've been here chanting their name.

general: The Clan gathers around and urges (prefix)kit to go to the front of the crowd. Not having a leader isn't an excuse to force a cat to stay in the nursery when they're six moons old. (prefix)kit is renamed to m_c, and the Clan votes to make (mentor) their mentor.
The Clan cheers for the new apprentice, m_c. They allow them to choose their own mentor, and m_c chooses (mentor).
With m_c's apprentice ceremony completed, there's still the problem of figuring out who will mentor them. (mentor) steps forward and offers to mentor them first, and m_c touches noses with them.
no_mentor: Newly-made apprentice, m_c wished they had someone to mentor them.
m_c isn't confident in their ability to train themself, but will try anyway.
m_c is frustrated that they don't have a mentor.
m_c isn't sure what to do without the guidance of a mentor.
adventurous: m_c excitedly touches noses with their new mentor, (mentor), looking quite eager to start training.
m_c can't seem to sit still as they bounce up to touch noses with (mentor), swearing they'll be the best warrior the Clan has ever seen.
Almost immediately after m_c touches noses with (mentor), they start asking about when they're going to go out and explore the territory.
m_c fidgets impatiently beside (mentor) as they wait for the meeting to end. They're finally an apprentice! They want to hurry up, get out there, and go, go, go!
As m_c touches noses with (mentor), they hope that they won't be boring and let them do something cool. Anything but gathering moss or tick duty!
(prefix)kit sits in front of the Clan with pride, their tiny heart beating so fast they think it might explode! They very excitedly touch noses with (mentor), happy to start their apprenticeship!
altruistic: Surprising (mentor), the first thing that m_c asks to do once the meeting ends is gather moss so everyone has fresh bedding.
m_c touches noses with (mentor) and hopes that they'll get to hunt first, so they can make sure the Clan is fed.
Eager to learn the best ways to help their Clan thrive, m_c excitedly touches noses with (mentor).
m_c purrs so hard that they're shaking as they touch noses with (mentor).
m_c silently swears to StarClan to do their best for the Clan as they touch noses with (mentor).

alive: p1 is watching with pride as m_c is named and given to (mentor) to apprentice under. They know that (mentor) was a good choice.

(prefix)kit loudly complains as p1 pulls them over to quickly groom their pelt. They manage to wriggle away and scurry off to the front of the crowd for their ceremony, where they are renamed to m_c and apprenticed to (mentor).

Even though they are excited to finally be made an apprentice, it takes a bit of coaxing for p1 for (prefix)kit to step forward for their ceremony. p1 watches in pride as they're named m_c, and touch noses with (mentor).
dead: m_c hopes that p1 is watching in pride from StarClan as they are apprenticed to (mentor).

m_c wishes that they could be happier about being made an apprentice as they touch noses with (mentor), but all they can think about is how much they wish that p1 was still there to chant their name with the rest of the Clan.
m_c tries to keep up a brave face as they're apprenticed to (mentor), but they keep stealing glances at the crowd, as if trying to find p1 despite knowing they're no longer with them.

m_c sits beside their new mentor, (mentor) as the meeting comes to a close. Their claws dig into the ground as they glare up at the sky, wondering why p1 couldn't be there with them at such an important moment.
m_c smiles up at the stars as they sit beside (mentor). The stars seem to shine brighter, and m_c knows it's a sign that p1 is still watching over them.
As m_c touches noses with their new mentor, (mentor), they make a silent promise to p1 to make them proud, and to take care of the Clan in their parent's absence.
m_c hopes that p2 is watching in pride from StarClan as they are apprenticed to (mentor).

m_c wishes that they could be happier about being made an apprentice as they touch noses with (mentor), but all they can think about is how much they wish that p2 was still there to chant their name with the rest of the Clan.

m_c smiles up at the stars as they sit beside (mentor). The stars seem to shine brighter, and m_c knows it's a sign that p1 and p2 are still watching over them.

general: (prefix)kit, like every young kit, had dreams of becoming a warrior from a young age. However, as they grew older, they knew that their destiny lay in the medicine den. They happily take up their new place as a medicine cat apprentice - looking forward to healing their Clanmates for many moons to come.
living_mentor: m_c has decided that hunting and fighting is not the way they can provide for their Clan. Instead, they have decided to serve their Clan by healing and communing with StarClan. (mentor) proudly becomes their mentor.
Interested in herbs even in their kithood, m_c is eager to be apprenticed to be apprenticed to (mentor).

Interested in all the myths and stories told by the elders and queens, m_c decides to become a medicine cat apprentice, hoping to someday speak to those gone before. (mentor) loves their determination and eagerness to learn and agrees to take them on as their apprentice.
The thought alone of fighting and hurting another cat makes m_c shiver. They decide to heal instead of fight, and (mentor) takes them under their wing.
Wanting to stand out among their Clanmates more, m_c decides to become a medicine cat, and is apprenticed to (mentor).
Worried they may not be good as a hunter or fighter, but still wanting to make their Clan proud somehow, m_c decides to become a medicine cat apprentice under (mentor).

(mentor) stands before the Clan and announces that they will not be there forever, and it time they took on an apprentice. They tell the Clan that they have chosen (prefix)kit, now m_c, to be their new apprentice.

(mentor) has no doubts in their mind of who their new apprentice will be. (prefix)kit has always been looking for an excuse to be in their den, asking endless questions about what each herb is and what it's used for. And as (mentor) announces that the newly named m_c, will be their apprentice, they see m_c's eyes shining in delight and excitement, and know they were right in choosing them.
no_mentor: Newly-made medicine cat apprentice m_c learns the way of healing through guidance from StarClan.
StarClan speaks, and has decided that the new medicine cat apprentice shall be m_c. m_c is unsure if they are ready for this role without a mentor, but the stars promise to guide them.
The Clan needs a new medicine cat, and m_c is chosen for the role. m_c is stunned that they were chosen, but agrees anyway, knowing how badly the Clan needs a medicine cat.

m_c has decided that hunting and fighting is not the way they can provide for their Clan. Instead, they have decided to serve their Clan by healing and communing with StarClan, who will be the ones to train them with the absence of a proper mentor.
Interested in herbs even in their kithood, m_c is eager to be made the new medicine cat apprentice, and learn how to heal from those who came before them.

The thought alone of fighting and hurting another cat makes m_c shiver. Knowing the Clan needs a medicine cat, they seize the chance to do good for the Clan without harming others, they take on the role of medicine cat apprentice.

Knowing the Clan is in desperate need of a medicine cat, and wanting to do something to stand out and do something more important, m_c announces mid-meeting that they want to be the new medicine cat apprentice.
Worried they may not be good as a hunter or fighter, but still wanting to make their Clan proud somehow, m_c decides to become a medicine cat, and is trained by StarClan.

As the new medicine cat apprentice, m_c dreams of StarClan for the first time. They are greeted by many StarClan cats, one of which they recognize as p1, who is watching in pride as the rest of StarClan's ranks accept the new medicine cat apprentice.

general: m_c feel sick at the mere thought of fighting. They decide to train as a mediator, and (mentor) is named as their mentor.
m_c is fascinated by (mentor)'s ability to solve disputes without tooth or claw. They are eager to learn, and (mentor) take them under their wing.
m_c feel sick at the mere thought of fighting. They decide to train as a mediator, and (mentor) is named as their mentor.
m_c is fascinated by (mentor)'s ability to solve disputes without tooth or claw. They are eager to learn, and (mentor) take them under their wing.

dead_mentor: As (prefix)paw is given their full name of m_c, and welcomed as the new medicine cat of the Clan, they look to the stars and hope that (mentor) will be there with the rest of StarClan in their dreams.

(prefix)paw still can't believe that their mentor is gone. They don't feel ready to heal the Clan, and so politely decline being given a name yet. However, as they visit StarClan that half moon, (mentor) appears to them in a dream. They assure (prefix)paw that they'll be alright without them, and that they are ready for their full name. Resting their muzzle on (prefix)paw's head, (mentor) names them m_c.
living_mentor: Whisperings on the wind tickle at (mentor)'s ears as they gaze up to the stars, an echo rolling smoothly off their tongue. StarClan blesses m_c and welcomes them!

With the stars softly shining and lighting their pelts, the senior medicine cat gives (prefix)paw their full name of m_c. They both share the rest of the night with StarClan, celebrating their good fortune in having another medicine cat.
Inspired by (prefix)paw's boundless energy and courage, (mentor) names them m_c, and welcomes them as a full medicine cat.

Having finally reached the end of their apprenticeship, newly named medicine cat, m_c, feels there's still so much to learn, and frets about whether or not they are ready. With twitching whiskers, (mentor) assures them that StarClan will always be there to guide them.

(mentor) still remembers when (prefix)paw was just a kit, batting around in the medicine den, and asking endless questions about everything under the sun. Even now they ask why their new name, m_c, was chosen with shining eyes and twitching whiskers.
no_mentor: (prefix)paw is taken to speak with StarClan. They are given the name m_c and are now a full medicine cat of the Clan.

The time has come for (prefix)paw to be given their full medicine cat name. (prefix)paw requests that one of the other Clans' medicicine cats name them. The eldest of the medicine cats steps forward and gives (prefix)paw the name m_c.
With their training complete, StarClan decides to allow (prefix)paw to choose their own name. They name themself m_c, and return to the Clan the next morning as a full medicine cat.
adventurous: As much as the warrior apprentices teased, (prefix)paw knew the truth. There was so much to see and do as a full medicine cat, and m_c could hardly wait to get started, almost charging off before their ceremony ended.
altruistic: Helping cats heal is what (prefix)paw does best, their full name of m_c proves to them that they're fully qualified to do so, and that StarClan has accepted them for it.
ambitious: As they take their first steps into being a full medicine cat, (prefix)paw quietly reflects that they might just have the most powerful position in the clan, now that they're m_c. StarClan itself has accepted them, speaks through them, and m_c will remember this.
bloodthirsty: StarClan gives them wisdom, their Clan gives them strength, (prefix)paw will use this power to heal their warriors well after battle. They are now m_c and will never turn away from what needs doing.
bold: (prefix)paw may have butted heads against nearly every Clan member they have, but being able to argue was a blessing in a medicine cat, as m_c will have to continue shoving odd mixtures down everyone's throat. StarClan will be watching them with pride.
calm: (prefix)paw has proven themsleves with one of the most invaluble traits a medicine cat can have - a level head under pressure. The stars of Silverpelt twinkle in joy and acceptance as m_c recives their full name and duites as a full medicine cat.
careful: It is (prefix)paw's attention to detail that earns them their medicine cat name of m_c. They will serve the Clan long and well, with no one doubting their skill and knowledge of herbs they've spent so many moons learning.
charismatic: (prefix)paw's charming attitude does as much for their patients as their skill does. They will continue to heal with words and herbs as m_c now that they are a full medicine cat of c_n.
childish: Though their actions may come off as lighthearted, (prefix)paw has worked hard to earn their name of m_c, and mews that they'll protect c_n as a medicine cat. Though they start giggling right after they say it, causing a few purrs of amusement from onlookers both here, and in StarClan.
cold: No one knows what (prefix)paw is thinking as they recive their medicine cat name of m_c, only that their eyes are focused, clear, and as immovable as ice. No one doubts that they will be well suited to the heartbreaks that wait for all medicine cats.
compassionate: Excellent medicine cats have as much heart as they do brains, and (prefix)paw proves they have both by the time they earn their name of m_c, proving a gentle touch does as much good as the right herbs.
confident: (prefix)paw is so sure of their skill as medicine cat that they give themselves their name of m_c. While it may not be tradition, no one can think of a better fitting name for them then the one they chose themselves, and welcome them warmly as a full medicine cat.
daring: (prefix)paw's methods are a little unconventional, but it's hard to argue with results, and (prefix)paw gets results. They gain their medicine cat name of m_c, and the eldest medicine of all the clans cat warning them not to do anything too strange, though m_c smirks through the lecture.
empathetic: There's so much pain that c_n has to endure, and (prefix)paw has decided to heal it all, no matter the cost. StarClan has accepted their passion, and supports them with the name of m_c, hoping that they can help ease some of the burden m_c placed on themselves.
faithful: StarClan lights their pawsteps, (prefix)paw has known that since they started their apprenticeship. Tonight of all nights, they feel starspeckled pelts pressed against them and weaving around them, and can't stop purring as they hear a multitude of voices call them m_c.
fierce: During their apprenticeship (prefix)paw struggled with the best way to protect c_n, with teeth or with tinctures, but now they're m_c they're certain they've made the right choice to be a medicine cat. Though they will keep practicing that battle move they've learned, just in case.
insecure: (prefix)paw hasn't ever been sure if the stars really did hold the memories of their ancestors or if they've made them proud, but returns as m_c the next morning, as a full medicine cat.
lonesome: While the rest of the Clan may not understand it (prefix)paw enjoys their time alone in the medicine den. In fact, now they're m_c they can't wait to get back to it, and away from the center of attention for their new name.
loving: Healing a sprain, comforting a bruised kit, soothing a sore elder, all of these things give (prefix)paw meaning in their life as a medicine cat. StarClan honors their caring heart with the name m_c.
loyal: c_n has raised and cared for (prefix)paw, and (prefix)paw wants nothing more but to do the same, taking on the name m_c as a full medicine cat of c_n. They will be thinking of how to care for c_n until the day they depart for StarClan, and maybe even past then as well.
nervous: (prefix)paw knows that they know all the herbs, they know that they know how to treat rat bites, but surely they need to learn more? StarClan assures them that they'll do fine, and gives them the name m_c as a sign of trust, even if m_c is sure it's still too soon.
patient: It is (prefix)paw's willingness to sit and listen that assures the other medicine cats it's time to give them their name of m_c. m_c thanks them graciously and tucks themselves back down to listen to the next cat speak.
playful: No one knows how (prefix)paw got their claws on it, but they manage to play with a shiny piece of twoleg something the whole time the other medicine cats give them their name of m_c. When asked why, m_c replied that one of their patients might like it, and they wanted to make sure it was safe before bringing it back home.
responsible: (prefix)paw always owns up to their mistakes, puts the work in to fix them, and is still surpised when they get their medicine cat name of m_c. They promise to work twice as hard to be worthy of it.
righteous: (prefix)paw says a silent prayer to StarClan as they get their medicine cat name of m_c. StarClan protect them, StarClan protect all of them, they hope they'll receive guidince in the moons ahead.
shameless: (prefix)paw blurts out their new medicine cat name of m_c, cutting off the words of the ceremony midmeow, not suprising anyone. There's no arguing with m_c, so the other medicine cats chear for them, through purrs of amusement.
sneaky: (prefix)paw's eyes glint as they get the medicine cat name of m_c. No one seems to notice that they don't agree to all of the vows of being a medicine cat, instead only nodding at some, and agreeing to others with a meow.
strange: No one knows why (prefix)paw brought a mossball to their medicine cat naming ceremony, but StarClan grants them their name of m_c all the same, welcoming them into the full mysteries of StarClan.
strict: The way (prefix)paw is sitting is so stiff you could use them as reinforcement of the camp walls. Even when they get their medicine cat name of m_c, they don't loosen up, and only seem to sit up even more.
thoughtful: Even though this is their medicine cat naming ceremony, (prefix)paw can only think about their patients back at camp, and asks if they can return early after they get their name of m_c.
StarClan honors the way (prefix)paw always goes the extra step to do their best as a medicine cat, and gives them the name of m_c, knowing that m_c will continue to do their best.
troublesome: This is a serious time for (prefex)paw, their medicine cat naming ceremony! Naturally, they're cracking jokes and being irreverent right up until the moment they get their name of m_c, and quiet down long enough to think of something funny to add.
vengeful: The other medicine cats mistake it as being calm, but (prefex)paw isn't quiet because they're at peace, but because they are angry. Every snide remark, every time someone sneered at them, every time they were treated less than, all of it goes through their mind. Now that they are m_c, c_n better treat them with respect, or there would be consequences.
wise: Medicine cat training had just felt right for (prefix)paw, more like remembering then learning, like they had done this before. When it comes time for their naming, they ask to name themselves, and chose m_c for their name. It feels right for them to be called m_c.
